import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Api } from '../API/Api' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' const EditProfile = () => { const userdata = useSelector(state => state.MyProfileReducer?.userDetail) console.log(userdata) const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const reqpayload = { date_of_birth: e.target.dob.value, first_name: e.target.fname.value, last_name: e.target.lname.value, mobile: e.target.mobile.value } console.log(reqpayload) Api.post(end) } return ( <>

My profile

Last Name

Date of Birth
Back
) } export default EditProfile
